title: Lamar Odom has opened eyes while in hospital
text:

Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Lamar Odom has opened eyes while in hospital Martin Rogers, USA TODAY 4:18 p.m. EDT October 16, 2015 Lamar Odom has been hospitalized since being found unresponsive in a Nevada brothel. (Photo: Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
LAS VEGAS ( USA TODAY ) â€“ Lamar Odom opened his eyes Friday morning, a person at the hospital where he remained in intensive care told USA TODAY Sports. 
Odom's eyes appeared to move in reaction to voices and other noise, the person said. 
The person asked not to be named due to the sensitivity of the matter. 
Odom has been in Sunrise Hospital since Tuesday, after being rushed to the facility following a three-day binge at a Nevada brothel that left him unresponsive. 
Friday brought the first positive signs for the former NBA player and estranged husband of reality television star Khloe Kardashian, as his heart showed evidence of increased function . 
A report from Entertainment Tonight claiming that Odom was in a strong enough condition to ask to see his children could not be confirmed by USA TODAY Sports. 
PHOTOS: LAMAR ODOM THROUGH THE YEARS Los Angeles Clippers forward Lamar Odom against the Phoenix Suns at the US Airways Center. (Jan 2013) Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports Dallas Mavericks power forward Lamar Odom dribbles to the basket against the New York Knicks at Madison Square Garden. Jason Merritt, Getty Images Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom with his trophy as the winner of the 2010-2011 NBA Sixth Man Award, as the league's top reserve. (Apr 2011) Reed Saxon, AP Lakers Derek Fisher, Lamar Odom and Pau Gasol signal for a tie ball during a play against the Denver Nuggets at Staples Center. (Apr 2011) Robert Hanashiro, USA TODAY Sports Los Angeles Lakers power forward Lamar Odom drives to the basket guarded by Utah Jazz power forward Paul Millsap at the Staples Center. (Oct 2010) Robert Hanashiro, USA TODAY Sports Lamar Odom, Pau Gasol and Andrew Bynum celebrate the Lakers' 83-79 win over Boston in game 7 of the NBA Finals. (Jun 2010) Robert Hanashiro, USA TODAY Sports US Lamar Odom celebrates after winning a point during a World Cup Championship semi final basketball match US versus Lithuania in Istanbul. (Sep 2010) Aris Messinis, AFP/Getty Images From left, Kendall Jenner, Kim Kardashian, Kylie Jenner, Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian and Kourtney Kardashian at the Teen Choice Awards in Aug. 2010. Chris Pizzello, AP Lamar Odom and then-wife Khloe Kardashian arrive at the Philippe Restaurant West Hollywood grand opening in Oct. 2009. Jason Merritt, Getty Images Miami Heat's Lamar Odom and Dwayne Wade celebrate their win against the New Orleans Hornets in Game 1 of their NBA first-round playoff series at the American Airlines Arena. (Apr 2004) J.P. Carter, AP Los Angeles' Lamar Odom during the Clippers' game against the Heat at the Staples Center.
